Chargement des packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(AER)
```

```{r}
elec_In <- elec_In %>% 
  mutate(treat = factor(treat),
         caste = factor(caste), 
         gender = factor(gender),
         religion = factor(religion),
         birthplace = factor(birthplace))
summary(elec_In)
```

```{r}
vi <- ivreg(total_expenditure ~ distance | distance, data = elec_In)
summary(vi)
```
